Ja Morant's Double-Double, Epic Dunk (That Didn't Count) Propel Grizzlies Past Spurs
Grizzlies top Spurs 129-115 as Ja Morant shines with a double-double and a viral dunk on Victor Wembanyama, proving unstoppable even after the whistle.

title: Noble Happy Family Reinforces Its Commitment to Exceptional Home Care in West Hartford, CT | User | mammothtimes.com
text:
Noble Happy Family in West Hartford, CT, reaffirms its commitment to exceptional elder care, emphasizing personalized services for seniors' well-being. With a focus on happiness, dignity, and quality, they remain a trusted community partner for families. Discover compassionate care tailored to your loved one's needs. Google it at [https://happynoblehomecare.com] for more information. West Hartford, CT - Noble Happy Family, an esteemed provider of elder care services, reiterates its steadfast commitment to the community of West Hartford, CT, ensuring that families seeking high-quality home care for their senior loved ones can always rely on its services. This announcement is a testament to the organization's dedication to maintaining the highest levels of care and responding to the sustained demand for dependable and exceptional elder care in the area. Noble Happy Family’s commitment highlights the importance of customized care strategies and the overall well-being of each senior they serve.
“Noble Happy Family is rooted in the belief that every senior deserves to live a life marked by happiness and dignity,” said Joanita Bilson, founder of Noble Happy Family. “Our dedication to providing top-tier elder care in West Hartford is unwavering. We’re not just a service provider; we’re a community partner committed to enriching the lives of seniors and offering peace of mind to their families. As we continue to evolve to meet the needs of our community, our promise remains the same: to deliver compassionate, individualized care that stands out for its quality and heart.”
Noble Happy Family’s approach to home care is characterized by personalized services tailored to each client's individual requirements. From assistance with daily activities to comprehensive support tailored to more specific care needs, this approach ensures seniors' enhanced quality of life, fostering independence, comfort, and comprehensive well-being.
For families in West Hartford, CT, seeking the best in-home care services, Noble Happy Family is the go-to source for their elderly care needs.
For more information about Noble Happy Family and their home care in West Hartford, CT , please visit their website at https://happynoblehomecare.com
About Noble Happy Family:
Noble Happy Family is a premier elder care provider in West Hartford, CT, known for its unwavering commitment to excellence and a team of dedicated caregivers. Offering a wide range of tailored services to meet the diverse needs of the elderly community, Noble Happy Family is dedicated to improving the lives of seniors and their families, ensuring they are the first choice for those seeking compassionate, high-quality care in the comfort of their homes.

author: ANI
title: Sports News | Duleep Trophy: Shashwat Rawat, Sanju Samson Knocks Highlights of Round 3 Day One
text:
Anantpur (Andhra Pradesh) [India], September 19 (ANI): A century from Shashwat Rawat and a fine attacking half-century from Sanju Samson were the highlights of the third round of the Duleep Trophy at Anantpur on Thursday.
Coming to the match between India A and India C, India C won the toss and elected to field first. India A had a poor start, with the pair of pacers Anshul Kambhoj and Vijaykumar Vyshak reducing the team to 36/5 and taking some crucial wickets of skipper Mayank Agarwal (6), Tilak Varma (5), Riyan Parag (2) etc.
Also Read |
'Might As Well Go Hard Like Rishabh Does' Ravi Ashwin Opens Up on His Aggressive Approach After Scoring Century in IND vs BAN 1st Test 2024 (Watch Video).
India A reached the 100-run mark in 44 overs.
A 87-run partnership for the sixth wicket between Rawat and Shams Mulani (44 in 76 balls, with five fours and a six) brought some respectability on India A's score.
Also Read |
IND vs BAN 1st Test 2024: Bangladesh Pacer Hasan Mahmud Joins Dale Steyn to Record Rare Feat During Match Against India.
Shashwat reached his 50 in 119 balls, with six fours and raced to his century in 188 balls, with 13 fours. He had partnerships with Tanush Kotian (10) and Avesh Khan (16*) which enabled India A to end their day on 224/7.
Kambhoj (3/40) was the pick of the bowlers for India C. Vijaykumar Vyshak (2/33) was also impressive with the ball.
In the other match, India B won the toss and elected to field first.
India D openers Devdutt Padikkal (50 in 95 balls, with eight fours) and Srikar Bharat (52 in 109 balls, with nine boundaries) put on a fine 105-run opening partnership. After their dismissal, a half-century partnership between Ricky Bhui (56 in 87 balls, with nine fours) and Nishant Sindhu (19) followed.
After India D was reduced to 216/5, Samson (89 in 83 balls, with 10 fours and three sixes) and Saransh Jain (26 in 56 balls, with four boundaries) put on a 90-run stand to take India D to 306/5 at the end of the day.
Rahul Chahar (3/60) was the pick of the bowlers for India D. (ANI)
(This is an unedited and auto-generated story from Syndicated News feed, LatestLY Staff may not have modified or edited the content body)

author: Richard Ramos
title: Teen killed, driver severely injured after vehicle coillides with tree in Tuolumne County - CBS Sacramento
text:
TUOLUMNE COUNTY — A teen passenger died and a driver suffered severe injuries after a vehicle collided with a tree near Don Pedro Lake in Tuolumne County earlier this week.
The California Highway Patrol Sonora said 20-year-old Sebastian Pendergast of La Grange in Stanislaus County was traveling with a 17-year-old girl in the front passenger seat along State Route 132 on the evening of December 26.
Pendergast was traveling at a high rate of speed when he failed to make a turn in the roadway, causing the vehicle to veer off the side and collide with a tree between Zazamora Street and Bonds Flat Road on the south side of the lake, authorities said.
The teen was declared dead at the scene while Pendergast was airlifted to UC Davis Medical Center in Sacramento for treatment of his injuries.
It is not yet known what exactly led to the crash. The CHP said it has not yet determined if drugs or alcohol were factors.
The deceased has not yet been identified.

author: Yeni Şafak
title: Mitri Raheb: Israël a tué au moins 3% de la communauté chrétienne de Gaza | Moyen-Orient
text:
Raheb, homme d'église de la ville historique de Bethléem, en Cisjordanie occupée par Israël, a fait des déclarations sur la situation en Palestine au site web "Democracy Now". Ce dernier a dit penser que la communauté chrétienne allait disparaître de Palestine, avant d'accuser Israël d'avoir tué moins 3% de la communauté chrétienne de Gaza. Soulignant que le Noël de cette année a été très triste et que, de toute sa vie, il n'avait jamais éprouvé une telle tristesse et, en même temps, une telle colère à l'égard de ce qui se passe à Gaza. "Les célébrations et les festivités de Noël à Bethléem ont été annulées, il n'y a pas de lumières ni d'arbres de Noël dans la ville" a expliqué le pasteur luthérien. Il a ajouté que les touristes ne venaient pas dans la ville en raison de la guerre et que les habitants n'avaient pas le cœur à faire la fête avec ce que subit le "peuple à Gaza", avant de préciser: Notre peuple en Cisjordanie, subit l'apartheid et la colonisation par les colons juifs Raheb a rappelé qu'au cours des 75 derniers jours, Israël a tué plus 20 000 personnes à Gaza et des centaines d'autres en Cisjordanie, et qu'il a interpellé plus de 3 000 Palestiniens en Cisjordanie. 3 % de la communauté chrétienne de Gaza a été tuée. "Plus de 8 000 enfants ont été tués à Gaza pour que Netanyahou reste au pouvoir" , a insisté Raheb. "Israël attaque les églises, les mosquées, les hôpitaux, les écoles et les universités. Croyez-le ou non, 11 universités ont été détruites au cours de cette guerre. Plus de 200 écoles ont été détruites" , a-t-il déploré. Le religieux a souligné qu'il était "honteux" pour les Etats-Unis d'avoir opposé leur veto au cessez-le-feu à un moment où les mots "paix dans le monde" sont entendus dans toutes les églises. L'ecclésiastique palestinien a aussi souligné:
L'histoire de Noël est en fait une histoire palestinienne. "La présence chrétienne à Gaza remonte à 2000 ans. Je pense que cette communauté va disparaître à cause de la guerre d'Israël contre Gaza. 3 % de la communauté chrétienne de Gaza a été tuée en 75 jours" , a-t-il conclu. A lire également:

author: @TheAsianAgeNews
title: Nitish in Delhi amid ‘joining NDA’ talks
text: Bihar deputy chief minister and RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav has rubbished the rumours about the resignation of Lalan Singh New Delhi: Top leaders of the Janata Dal (United) are in New Delhi for the party’s national executive meeting on Friday. The two-day meeting was convened by JD(U) president Rajiv Ranjan Singh, popularly known as Lalan Singh, amid speculation that he could step down to make way for Bihar chief minister Nitish Kumar to take over the reins of the party again. The JD(U)’s national office-bearers' meeting was held Thursday and this will be followed by national executive and national council meetings on Friday. However, Lalan Singh dismissed reports of his resignation, saying a “narrative” has been set by the media at the behest of the ruling BJP. Mr Singh said the meeting was a routine one, and stressed that his party remains united. “If I have to resign, I will call you (the media), and consult you about what to write in the resignation letter, so that you can go to the BJP office and get the draft. You are trying to set the narrative… JD(U) is one, and will remain united,” Mr Singh said. Speculation has been rife that Mr Singh may be asked to resign due to his alleged proximity to ally Rashtriya Janata Dal (RJD). A section of the media also claimed that after having dumped the BJP in August last year, Mr Kumar was now planning an about-turn. Mr Nitish Kumar asserted that the party’s meeting was a “normal and annual” affair with “nothing extraordinary” about it, rejecting speculation about turmoil in his party. He, however, ducked questions when asked whether Lalan Singh was likely to make a formal offer of his resignation at the meeting on December 29. He also evaded questions about the rumours of his joining the NDA. Bihar deputy chief minister and RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav has rubbished the rumours about the resignation of Lalan Singh. “These is all useless talk… Every party holds its national executive meeting. We also held our party’s national executive meeting in Delhi,” Mr Yadav said. At the national executive meeting venue, posters featuring Bihar CM Nitish Kumar reading “Pradesh ne pehchana, ab desh bhi pehchanega” (The state of Bihar recognised him, now the nation will) were put up. However, as the Lok Sabha elections draw closer, the BJP claims that a transfer of power in Bihar is in the offing, a claim strongly denied by the ruling coalition. Union minister and BJP leader Giriraj Singh said: “Nitish Kumar ji will remain the chief minister of Bihar for just a few days. Lalu Prasad Yadav has created a ‘chakravyuh’ for this. The first step of this ‘chakravyuh’ was making Awadh Bihar the Speaker of the Bihar Assembly. Nitish Kumar will become former (CM) very soon… It is fixed that Nitish Kumar will not remain the CM anymore. In the next few days, Bihar is going to get a CM from the RJD…”

author: Ольга Сакиулова
title: Китайский монстр G700 способен то, о чём другие внедорожники и не мечтают
text:
Внешне G700 напоминает коктейль из Land Rover Defender и Toyota Land Cruiser 250. Но копией его не назовёшь — у него собственный стиль. Гигантский кузов (длина — 5198 мм, ширина — 2050 мм) прячет в себе современную раму и полностью независимую подвеску с пневматикой. В максимальном положении дорожный просвет достигает 320 мм — то, что нужно для серьёзного бездорожья.
И вот в чём парадокс: китайцы сделали рамный внедорожник с пневмоподвеской, но пошли дальше — под капотом тут вовсе не дизель. Мощность в 751 л. с. обеспечивает гибридная система Chery Kupeng CDM-O. В её составе:
двухлитровый турбодвигатель (211 л. с.);
два электромотора — по одному на каждую ось;
литий-железо-фосфатная батарея;
и двухступенчатый редуктор для передачи момента на передние колёса.
Результат? Ускорение до "сотни" за 4,6 секунды. У суперкроссоверов нет шансов. Максимальная скорость — 180 км/ч, а вес при этом — более трёх тонн (до 3180 кг в зависимости от конфигурации).
Jetour Zongheng G700 не про скорость, а про свободу. Благодаря силовой установке и внушительному баку запас хода составляет 1400 километров. Это значит, что можно не думать о заправках даже в самой глуши. К тому же, машина способна тянуть прицеп весом до 2,5 тонны. Подзарядка батареи с 20 до 80% — всего за 10 минут.
Китайцы, похоже, вдохновлялись амфибией Yangwang U8. Новый G700 при необходимости способен преодолевать водные преграды — до 40 минут он может держаться на плаву, благодаря герметичной конструкции кузова.
Салон встречает не брезентовыми сиденьями, а кожей и металлом. Шестиместная конфигурация, кожаная отделка, экран на всю ширину панели вместо приборки, и 15,6-дюймовый дисплей мультимедиа — всё как в премиум-сегменте. Кнопки остались только на тоннеле, где есть и беспроводная зарядка для гаджетов.
Звучит странно, но да: несмотря на общую концепцию "рамный внедорожник", китайский G700 заметно отличается от Mercedes-Benz G-Class. У "немца" — передняя независимая подвеска и задний мост, у китайца — полностью независимая схема с возможностью подстраивать клиренс.
Jetour (кит. 捷途) — отдельный бренд китайского автопроизводителя и автоконцерна Chery, созданный в январе 2018 года. Название бренда состоит из комбинации английских слов jet («реактивный самолёт») и tour («путешествие»).

author: Victor Valley News Group
title: Swift Water Rescue in Apple Valley After Sudden Storm Brings Thunder, Lightning, and Hail on Wednesday
text:
APPLE VALLEY, Calif. (VVNG.com) — Residents around the Victor Valley experienced a drastic change in weather on Wednesday evening when a sudden storm rolled into the area bringing thunder, lightning, flash flooding, and even hail.
On March 20, 2023, not long after an ominous sunset, the remnants of the spring storm moved into the Victor Valley producing several noticeable large cloud formations.
Some residents in the Mesa area of Hesperia and Oak Hills reported experiencing rain and thunder. However, residents in the Town of Apple Valley experienced flash flooding, lightning, and hail.
“In all the years I have lived in the high desert, I had never heard the emergency sirens. It was crazy and scary to hear,” commented Victor Valley News Group Member Norma Armenta.
Joshua Castro replied and said it was the Spring Valley Lake siren that is used to tell everyone to get out of the water or to stay away.
Taylor Shane shared a photo of his garage that was completely flooded near Apple Valley Road and Highway 18. Shane said it rained for approximately 15 minutes but it was enough to flood his garage and a bedroom.
At about 8:11 pm, Firefighters from the Apple Valley Fire Protection District were dispatched to a swift water rescue on Kasota Road, just south of Highway 18, near Potomac Road.
A woman driving in a blue Honda Fit ran off the roadway, and into a drainage wash. She was stuck inside the vehicle and unable to exit safely on her own.
Interim Batallion Chief Sean Grober said they utilized Medic Truck 336 to rescue the victim.
“It seemed we had a cell come over Apple Valley and lasted for about 45 minutes or so, brought a significant amount of rain,” stated Grober. “The victim was not harmed in any way and is doing well and in good spirits.”
Desert Recovery founding members Eddie Kochara and his wife Shannon responded to the incident and helped the owner recover the vehicle from the moving water.
Desert Recovery is a Facebook group with over 11,000 members who volunteer their time and personal vehicles to help motorists who are stuck in places usually where tow trucks can’t service. The group never charges a fee for helping someone out.
To follow updates to this article and more, join our

author: @pmvalenzuela
title: Arturo Vidal le entrega una gran noticia a Colo Colo - Bolavip Chile
text:
Colo Colo Arturo Vidal sorprende y le entrega una de las mejores noticias a Colo Colo: "No se asusten..." El King ya está de vuelta y se alista para el que será su regreso a las canchas tras la rebelde lesión muscular.
FOTOS: Vocalista de Ke Personajes se olvida de la U y posa con camiseta y figura de Colo Colo Campeón del mundo con Argentina le pone sus fichas a Colo Colo ante River Por Patricio Muñoz
05/09/2024 - 16:26hs CLT
whatsapp 05/09/2024 - 16:26hs CLT
© DRAGOMIR YANKOVIC/PHOTOSPORT Arturo Vidal habría superado su última lesión en Colo Colo. (Foto: Dragomir Yankovic/Photosport) Por Patricio Muñoz
Este jueves Arturo Vidal entregó una gran noticia en Colo Colo , al superar la lesión muscular -de triceps sural izquierdo- que lo marginó de varios compromisos en los útimos dos meses.
Así lo informó el propio King, quien ya estaría en condiciones de ser considerado por el entrenador Jorge Almirón para los próximos partidos del Cacique.
A través de una publicación en Instagram, el volante de 37 años escribió un desafiante mensaje para dar a conocer su regreso a las canchas.
“No se asusten, volvió el King” , escribió Vidal junto a una fotografía entrenando en el Estadio Monumental.
También subió una historia en el gimnasio del reducto de Macul junto a Leonardo Gil , con el mensaje: “Estamos ready con mi hermanito”.
Captura de la publicación de Arturo Vidal en Instagram. La rebelde lesión muscular que tuvo Arturo Vidal Cabe recordar que el bicampeón de América se lesionó el 21 de julio en el triunfo por 2-1 ante Unión Española. Intentó adelantar el alta médica para el Superclásico con Universidad de Chile del 10 de agosto, donde solo pudo disputar el primer tiempo.
Luego, quiso estar para la ida de los octavos de final de Copa Libertadores ante Junior de Barranquilla, pero se resintió en el trabajo precompetitivo. Finalmente en la revancha en Colombia, jugó los últimos minutos.
Captura de la historia de Instagram de Arturo Vidal. El King se recuperó antes de lo esperado Desde ahí que el ex Barcelona se mantuvo fuera de las canchas para tener una óptima recuperación. Incluso, en el cuerpo técnico pensaban que recién iba a estar disponible para el clásico contra Universidad Católica del próximo viernes 13 de septiembre.
El gran objetivo del oriundo de San Joaquín era llegar a la llave de cuartos de final de la Libertadores contra River Plate, el martes 17 y 24 de septiembre.
Patricio Muñoz Arturo Vidal LEE TAMBIÉN Selección Chilena Selección Chilena Argentino campeón del mundo y el grave problema de La Roja de Gareca
